content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw;
GO

-- Create an external file format for DELIMITED (CSV/TSV) files.
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format
WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT
      , FORMAT_OPTIONS (

        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ','
       ,STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
       ,FIRST_ROW = 2 
       ,USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
       ,ENCODING = 'UTF8'
       ,PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
        )
    
    );
